verses.verse: ( Prophecy and Tongues) Διώκετε <WG1377> Diōkete Earnestly pursue τὴν <WG3588> tēn - ἀγάπην <WG26> agapēn love ζηλοῦτε <WG2206> zēloute eagerly desire δὲ <WG1161> de and τὰ <WG3588> ta - πνευματικά <WG4152> pneumatika spiritual gifts , μᾶλλον <WG3123> mallon especially δὲ <WG1161> de - ἵνα <WG2443> hina [the gift] προφητεύητε <WG4395> prophēteuēte of prophecy .

ὁ <WG3588> ho he who γὰρ <WG1063> gar For λαλῶν <WG2980> lalōn speaks γλώσσῃ <WG1100> glōssē in a tongue οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv ἀνθρώποις <WG444> anthrōpois to men , λαλεῖ <WG2980> lalei does not speak ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla but Θεῷ <WG2316> Theō to God . οὐδεὶς <WG3762> oudeis no one γὰρ <WG1063> gar Indeed , ἀκούει <WG191> akouei understands [him] ; πνεύματι <WG4151> pneumati in the Spirit . δὲ <WG1161> de - λαλεῖ <WG2980> lalei he utters μυστήρια <WG3466> mystēria mysteries

ὁ <WG3588> ho he who δὲ <WG1161> de But προφητεύων <WG4395> prophēteuōn prophesies ἀνθρώποις <WG444> anthrōpois to men λαλεῖ <WG2980> lalei speaks οἰκοδομὴν <WG3619> oikodomēn [for their] edification , καὶ <WG2532> kai - παράκλησιν <WG3874> paraklēsin encouragement , καὶ <WG2532> kai and παραμυθίαν <WG3889> paramythian comfort .

ὁ <WG3588> ho The [one who] λαλῶν <WG2980> lalōn speaks γλώσσῃ <WG1100> glōssē in a tongue ἑαυτὸν <WG1438> heauton himself , οἰκοδομεῖ <WG3618> oikodomei edifies ὁ <WG3588> ho the [one who] δὲ <WG1161> de but προφητεύων <WG4395> prophēteuōn prophesies ἐκκλησίαν <WG1577> ekklēsian [the] church . οἰκοδομεῖ <WG3618> oikodomei edifies

Θέλω <WG2309> Thelō I wish that δὲ <WG1161> de - πάντας <WG3956> pantas all ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas of you λαλεῖν <WG2980> lalein could speak γλώσσαις <WG1100> glōssais in tongues , μᾶλλον <WG3123> mallon I would rather δὲ <WG1161> de but ἵνα <WG2443> hina have προφητεύητε <WG4395> prophēteuēte you prophesy . μείζων <WG3173> meizōn [is] greater δὲ <WG1161> de - ὁ <WG3588> ho He who προφητεύων <WG4395> prophēteuōn prophesies ἢ <WG2228> ē than ὁ <WG3588> ho [one who] λαλῶν <WG2980> lalōn speaks γλώσσαις <WG1100> glōssais in tongues , ἐκτὸς <WG1622> ektos unless εἰ <WG1487> ei . . . μὴ <WG3361> mē . . . διερμηνεύῃ <WG1329> diermēneuē he interprets ἵνα <WG2443> hina so that ἡ <WG3588> hē the ἐκκλησία <WG1577> ekklēsia church οἰκοδομὴν <WG3619> oikodomēn edified . λάβῃ <WG2983> labē may be

Νῦν <WG3568> Nyn Now , δέ <WG1161> de - ἀδελφοί <WG80> adelphoi brothers , ἐὰν <WG1437> ean if ἔλθω <WG2064> elthō I come πρὸς <WG4314> pros to ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you γλώσσαις <WG1100> glōssais in tongues , λαλῶν <WG2980> lalōn speaking τί <WG5101> ti how ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you , ὠφελήσω <WG5623> ōphelēsō will I benefit ἐὰν <WG1437> ean unless μὴ <WG3361> mē . . . ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you λαλήσω <WG2980> lalēsō I [bring] ἢ <WG2228> ē - ἐν <WG1722> en - ἀποκαλύψει <WG602> apokalypsei [some] revelation ἢ <WG2228> ē or ἐν <WG1722> en - γνώσει <WG1108> gnōsei knowledge ἢ <WG2228> ē or ἐν <WG1722> en - προφητείᾳ <WG4394> prophēteia prophecy ἢ <WG2228> ē or ‹ἐν› <WG1722> en - διδαχῇ <WG1322> didachē teaching ?

ὅμως <WG3676> homōs Even in the case of τὰ <WG3588> ta - ἄψυχα <WG895> apsycha lifeless φωνὴν <WG5456> phōnēn . . . , διδόντα <WG1325> didonta instruments εἴτε <WG1535> eite such as αὐλὸς <WG836> aulos [the] flute εἴτε <WG1535> eite or κιθάρα <WG2788> kithara harp , ἐὰν <WG1437> ean unless διαστολὴν <WG1293> diastolēn are distinct ? τοῖς <WG3588> tois the φθόγγοις <WG5353> phthongois notes μὴ <WG3361> mē . . . δῷ <WG1325> dō they are playing πῶς <WG4459> pōs how γνωσθήσεται <WG1097> gnōsthēsetai will [anyone] recognize τὸ <WG3588> to [the tune] αὐλούμενον <WG832> auloumenon . . . ἢ <WG2228> ē . . . τὸ <WG3588> to . . . κιθαριζόμενον <WG2789> kitharizomenon . . .

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai Again γὰρ <WG1063> gar . . . , ἐὰν <WG1437> ean if ἄδηλον <WG82> adēlon a muffled σάλπιγξ <WG4536> salpinx [the] trumpet φωνὴν <WG5456> phōnēn call , δῷ <WG1325> dō sounds τίς <WG5101> tis who παρασκευάσεται <WG3903> paraskeuasetai will prepare εἰς <WG1519> eis for πόλεμον <WG4171> polemon battle ?

οὕτως <WG3779> houtōs So καὶ <WG2532> kai [it is] ὑμεῖς <WG4771> hymeis with you . διὰ <WG1223> dia with τῆς <WG3588> tēs [your] γλώσσης <WG1100> glōssēs tongue , ἐὰν <WG1437> ean Unless μὴ <WG3361> mē . . . εὔσημον <WG2154> eusēmon intelligible λόγον <WG3056> logon words δῶτε <WG1325> dōte you speak πῶς <WG4459> pōs how γνωσθήσεται <WG1097> gnōsthēsetai will [anyone] know τὸ <WG3588> to what λαλούμενον <WG2980> laloumenon you are saying ? ἔσεσθε <WG1510> esesthe You will [ just ] be γὰρ <WG1063> gar vvv εἰς <WG1519> eis into ἀέρα <WG109> aera [the] air . λαλοῦντες <WG2980> lalountes speaking

Τοσαῦτα <WG5118> Tosauta many εἰ <WG1487> ei vvv τύχοι <WG5177> tychoi Assuredly , γένη <WG1085> genē different φωνῶν <WG5456> phōnōn languages εἰσιν <WG1510> eisin there are ἐν <WG1722> en in κόσμῳ <WG2889> kosmō [the] world , καὶ <WG2532> kai yet οὐδὲν <WG3762> ouden none [of them is] ἄφωνον <WG880> aphōnon without meaning .

ἐὰν <WG1437> ean If , οὖν <WG3767> oun then , μὴ <WG3361> mē vvv εἰδῶ <WG1492> eidō I do not know τὴν <WG3588> tēn the δύναμιν <WG1411> dynamin meaning τῆς <WG3588> tēs of someone’s φωνῆς <WG5456> phōnēs language , ἔσομαι <WG1510> esomai I am τῷ <WG3588> tō to the λαλοῦντι <WG2980> lalounti speaker , βάρβαρος <WG915> barbaros a foreigner ( Literally a barbarian; twice in this verse) καὶ <WG2532> kai and ὁ <WG3588> ho vvv λαλῶν <WG2980> lalōn [he is] ἐν <WG1722> en to ἐμοὶ <WG1473> emoi me . βάρβαρος <WG915> barbaros a foreigner

Οὕτως <WG3779> Houtōs It is the same καὶ <WG2532> kai . . . ὑμεῖς <WG4771> hymeis with you . ἐπεὶ <WG1893> epei Since ζηλωταί <WG2207> zēlōtai eager to have ἐστε <WG1510> este you are πνευμάτων <WG4151> pneumatōn spiritual gifts , πρὸς <WG4314> pros . . . τὴν <WG3588> tēn [in gifts that] οἰκοδομὴν <WG3619> oikodomēn build up τῆς <WG3588> tēs the ἐκκλησίας <WG1577> ekklēsias church . ζητεῖτε <WG2212> zēteite strive ἵνα <WG2443> hina to περισσεύητε <WG4052> perisseuēte excel

Διὸ <WG1352> Dio Therefore , ὁ <WG3588> ho the [one who] λαλῶν <WG2980> lalōn speaks γλώσσῃ <WG1100> glōssē in a tongue προσευχέσθω <WG4336> proseuchesthō should pray ἵνα <WG2443> hina that διερμηνεύῃ <WG1329> diermēneuē he may interpret .

ἐὰν <WG1437> ean if γὰρ <WG1063> gar For προσεύχωμαι <WG4336> proseuchōmai I pray γλώσσῃ <WG1100> glōssē in a tongue , τὸ <WG3588> to - πνεῦμά <WG4151> pneuma spirit μου <WG1473> mou my προσεύχεται <WG4336> proseuchetai prays , ὁ <WG3588> ho - δὲ <WG1161> de but νοῦς <WG3563> nous mind μου <WG1473> mou my ἄκαρπός <WG175> akarpos unfruitful . ἐστιν <WG1510> estin is

Τί <WG5101> Ti What οὖν <WG3767> oun then ἐστιν <WG1510> estin [shall I do] ? προσεύξομαι <WG4336> proseuxomai I will pray τῷ <WG3588> tō with [my] πνεύματι <WG4151> pneumati spirit , προσεύξομαι <WG4336> proseuxomai I will also pray δὲ <WG1161> de but καὶ <WG2532> kai vvv τῷ <WG3588> tō with [my] νοΐ <WG3563> noi mind . ψαλῶ <WG5567> psalō I will sing τῷ <WG3588> tō with [my] πνεύματι <WG4151> pneumati spirit , ψαλῶ <WG5567> psalō I will also sing δὲ <WG1161> de but καὶ <WG2532> kai vvv τῷ <WG3588> tō with [my] νοΐ <WG3563> noi mind .

ἐπεὶ <WG1893> epei Otherwise , ἐὰν <WG1437> ean if εὐλογῇς <WG2127> eulogēs you speak a blessing [ἐν] <WG1722> en in πνεύματι <WG4151> pneumati spirit , ( Or in the Spirit) ὁ <WG3588> ho can [someone] ἀναπληρῶν <WG378> anaplērōn vvv τὸν <WG3588> ton vvv τόπον <WG5117> topon vvv τοῦ <WG3588> tou vvv ἰδιώτου <WG2399> idiōtou who is uninstructed πῶς <WG4459> pōs how ἐρεῖ <WG2046> erei say τὸ <WG3588> to - Ἀμήν <WG281> Amēn “ Amen ” ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi to τῇ <WG3588> tē - σῇ <WG4674> sē your εὐχαριστίᾳ <WG2169> eucharistia thanksgiving , ἐπειδὴ <WG1894> epeidē since τί <WG5101> ti what λέγεις <WG3004> legeis you are saying ? οὐκ <WG3756> ouk . . . οἶδεν <WG1492> oiden he does not know

σὺ <WG4771> sy You may μὲν <WG3303> men vvv γὰρ <WG1063> gar vvv καλῶς <WG2573> kalōs well enough , εὐχαριστεῖς <WG2168> eucharisteis be giving thanks ἀλλ’ <WG235> all’ but ὁ <WG3588> ho the ἕτερος <WG2087> heteros other one οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv οἰκοδομεῖται <WG3618> oikodomeitai is not edified .

Εὐχαριστῶ <WG2168> Eucharistō I thank τῷ <WG3588> tō - Θεῷ <WG2316> Theō God πάντων <WG3956> pantōn than all ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn of you . μᾶλλον <WG3123> mallon more γλώσσαις <WG1100> glōssais in tongues λαλῶ <WG2980> lalō that I speak

ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla But ἐν <WG1722> en in ἐκκλησίᾳ <WG1577> ekklēsia [the] church , θέλω <WG2309> thelō I would rather πέντε <WG4002> pente five λόγους <WG3056> logous words τῷ <WG3588> tō vvv νοΐ <WG3563> noi coherent μου <WG1473> mou vvv λαλῆσαι <WG2980> lalēsai speak ἵνα <WG2443> hina to καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἄλλους <WG243> allous others κατηχήσω <WG2727> katēchēsō instruct ἢ <WG2228> ē than μυρίους <WG3463> myrious ten thousand λόγους <WG3056> logous words ἐν <WG1722> en in γλώσσῃ <WG1100> glōssē a tongue .

Ἀδελφοί <WG80> Adelphoi Brothers , μὴ <WG3361> mē stop παιδία <WG3813> paidia like children . γίνεσθε <WG1096> ginesthe vvv ταῖς <WG3588> tais - φρεσίν <WG5424> phresin thinking ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla - τῇ <WG3588> tē In [regard to] κακίᾳ <WG2549> kakia evil νηπιάζετε <WG3515> nēpiazete be infants , ταῖς <WG3588> tais in [your] δὲ <WG1161> de but φρεσὶν <WG5424> phresin thinking τέλειοι <WG5046> teleioi mature . γίνεσθε <WG1096> ginesthe be

ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō the νόμῳ <WG3551> nomō Law : γέγραπται <WG1125> gegraptai It is written ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - Ἐν <WG1722> En “ By ἑτερογλώσσοις <WG2084> heteroglōssois strange tongues καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐν <WG1722> en - χείλεσιν <WG5491> cheilesin lips ἑτέρων <WG2087> heterōn foreign λαλήσω <WG2980> lalēsō I will speak τῷ <WG3588> tō - λαῷ <WG2992> laō people , τούτῳ <WG3778> toutō to this καὶ <WG2532> kai [but] οὐδ’ <WG3761> oud’ even οὕτως <WG3779> houtōs then εἰσακούσονταί <WG1522> eisakousontai they will not listen to μου <WG1473> mou Me , λέγει <WG3004> legei says Κύριος <WG2962> Kyrios [the] Lord .” ( )

Ὥστε <WG5620> Hōste then , αἱ <WG3588> hai - γλῶσσαι <WG1100> glōssai Tongues , εἰς <WG1519> eis - σημεῖόν <WG4592> sēmeion a sign , εἰσιν <WG1510> eisin are οὐ <WG3756> ou not τοῖς <WG3588> tois for πιστεύουσιν <WG4100> pisteuousin believers , ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla but τοῖς <WG3588> tois for ἀπίστοις <WG571> apistois unbelievers . ἡ <WG3588> hē - δὲ <WG1161> de - προφητεία <WG4394> prophēteia Prophecy , οὐ <WG3756> ou not τοῖς <WG3588> tois for ἀπίστοις <WG571> apistois unbelievers . ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla however , τοῖς <WG3588> tois [is] for πιστεύουσιν <WG4100> pisteuousin believers ,

Ἐὰν <WG1437> Ean if οὖν <WG3767> oun So συνέλθῃ <WG4905> synelthē comes ἡ <WG3588> hē the ἐκκλησία <WG1577> ekklēsia church ὅλη <WG3650> holē whole ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi together τὸ <WG3588> to . . . αὐτὸ <WG846> auto . . . καὶ <WG2532> kai and πάντες <WG3956> pantes everyone λαλῶσιν <WG2980> lalōsin speaks γλώσσαις <WG1100> glōssais in tongues , εἰσέλθωσιν <WG1525> eiselthōsin come in , δὲ <WG1161> de and ἰδιῶται <WG2399> idiōtai some who are uninstructed ἢ <WG2228> ē or ἄπιστοι <WG571> apistoi some unbelievers οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv ἐροῦσιν <WG2046> erousin will they not say ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that μαίνεσθε <WG3105> mainesthe you are out of your minds ?

ἐὰν <WG1437> ean if δὲ <WG1161> de But πάντες <WG3956> pantes everyone προφητεύωσιν <WG4395> prophēteuōsin is prophesying , εἰσέλθῃ <WG1525> eiselthē comes in δέ <WG1161> de while τις <WG5100> tis an ἄπιστος <WG571> apistos unbeliever ἢ <WG2228> ē or ἰδιώτης <WG2399> idiōtēs uninstructed person ἐλέγχεται <WG1651> elenchetai he will be convicted ὑπὸ <WG5259> hypo - πάντων <WG3956> pantōn - ἀνακρίνεται <WG350> anakrinetai [and] called to account ὑπὸ <WG5259> hypo by πάντων <WG3956> pantōn all ,

τὰ <WG3588> ta [and] the κρυπτὰ <WG2927> krypta secrets τῆς <WG3588> tēs of καρδίας <WG2588> kardias heart αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou his φανερὰ <WG5318> phanera made known . γίνεται <WG1096> ginetai will be καὶ <WG2532> kai So οὕτως <WG3779> houtōs . . . πεσὼν <WG4098> pesōn he will fall ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi vvv πρόσωπον <WG4383> prosōpon facedown προσκυνήσει <WG4352> proskynēsei [and] worship τῷ <WG3588> tō - Θεῷ <WG2316> Theō God , ἀπαγγέλλων <WG518> apangellōn proclaiming ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - Ὄντως <WG3689> Ontōs truly ὁ <WG3588> ho - , Θεὸς <WG2316> Theos “ God ἐν <WG1722> en among ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you ! ” ἐστιν <WG1510> estin is

( Orderly Worship) Τί <WG5101> Ti What οὖν <WG3767> oun then ἐστιν <WG1510> estin [shall we say] , ἀδελφοί <WG80> adelphoi brothers ? ὅταν <WG3752> hotan When συνέρχησθε <WG4905> synerchēsthe you come together , ἕκαστος <WG1538> hekastos everyone ψαλμὸν <WG5568> psalmon a psalm ἔχει <WG2192> echei has διδαχὴν <WG1322> didachēn a teaching , ἔχει <WG2192> echei [or] ἀποκάλυψιν <WG602> apokalypsin a revelation , ἔχει <WG2192> echei - γλῶσσαν <WG1100> glōssan a tongue , ἔχει <WG2192> echei - ἑρμηνείαν <WG2058> hermēneian an interpretation . ἔχει <WG2192> echei [or] πάντα <WG3956> panta All [of these] πρὸς <WG4314> pros to οἰκοδομὴν <WG3619> oikodomēn build up [ the church ] . γινέσθω <WG1096> ginesthō must be done

Εἴτε <WG1535> Eite If γλώσσῃ <WG1100> glōssē in a tongue , τις <WG5100> tis anyone λαλεῖ <WG2980> lalei speaks κατὰ <WG2596> kata [should speak] δύο <WG1417> dyo two , ἢ <WG2228> ē or τὸ <WG3588> to [at] πλεῖστον <WG4118> pleiston most τρεῖς <WG5140> treis three , καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἀνὰ <WG303> ana in μέρος <WG3313> meros turn , καὶ <WG2532> kai and εἷς <WG1520> heis someone διερμηνευέτω <WG1329> diermēneuetō must interpret .

ἐὰν <WG1437> ean if δὲ <WG1161> de But μὴ <WG3361> mē no ᾖ <WG1510> ē there is διερμηνευτής <WG1328> diermēneutēs interpreter , σιγάτω <WG4601> sigatō he should remain silent ἐν <WG1722> en in ἐκκλησίᾳ <WG1577> ekklēsia [the] church ἑαυτῷ <WG1438> heautō to himself δὲ <WG1161> de and λαλείτω <WG2980> laleitō speak [only] καὶ <WG2532> kai and τῷ <WG3588> tō - Θεῷ <WG2316> Theō God .

Προφῆται <WG4396> Prophētai prophets δὲ <WG1161> de - δύο <WG1417> dyo Two ἢ <WG2228> ē or τρεῖς <WG5140> treis three λαλείτωσαν <WG2980> laleitōsan should speak , καὶ <WG2532> kai and οἱ <WG3588> hoi the ἄλλοι <WG243> alloi others διακρινέτωσαν <WG1252> diakrinetōsan should weigh carefully [what is said] .

ἐὰν <WG1437> ean if δὲ <WG1161> de And ἄλλῳ <WG243> allō to someone who ἀποκαλυφθῇ <WG601> apokalyphthē a revelation comes καθημένῳ <WG2521> kathēmenō is seated , ὁ <WG3588> ho the πρῶτος <WG4413> prōtos first [speaker] σιγάτω <WG4601> sigatō should stop .

δύνασθε <WG1410> dynasthe you can γὰρ <WG1063> gar For καθ’ <WG2596> kath’ in ἕνα <WG1520> hena [turn] πάντες <WG3956> pantes all προφητεύειν <WG4395> prophēteuein prophesy ἵνα <WG2443> hina so that πάντες <WG3956> pantes everyone μανθάνωσιν <WG3129> manthanōsin may be instructed καὶ <WG2532> kai and πάντες <WG3956> pantes - παρακαλῶνται <WG3870> parakalōntai encouraged .
καὶ <WG2532> kai - πνεύματα <WG4151> pneumata [The] spirits προφητῶν <WG4396> prophētōn of prophets προφήταις <WG4396> prophētais to prophets . ὑποτάσσεται <WG5293> hypotassetai are subject
